018package org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.internal;
019
020import static java.lang.System.getProperty;
021import static java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
023import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.InputFormat.CSV;
024import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.ReportFormat.TEXT;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.PROPERTY_USER_HOME;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
027
028import java.nio.file.Path;
029import java.sql.Connection;
030import java.sql.SQLException;
031import java.time.LocalDate;
032import java.util.HashMap;
033import java.util.Map;
034
035import org.apiguardian.api.API;
036import org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration;
037import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
038import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.stringconverter.PathStringConverter;
039
040/**
041 *  The base class for the configuration bean.
042 *
043 *  @version $Id: ConfigurationBase.java 122 2022-02-12 20:09:13Z tquadrat $
044 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
045 *  @UMLGraph.link
046 *  @since 0.0.1
047 */
048@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ConfigurationBase.java 122 2022-02-12 20:09:13Z tquadrat $" )
049@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
050public abstract class ConfigurationBase implements Configuration
051{
052        /*---------------*\
053    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
054        \*---------------*/
055
056        /*-----------*\
057    ====** Constants **========================================================
058        \*-----------*/
059
060        /*------------*\
061    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
062        \*------------*/
063
064        /*------------------------*\
065    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
066        \*------------------------*/
067
068        /*--------------*\
069    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
070        \*--------------*/
071    /**
072     *  Creates a new instance of {@code ConfigurationBase}.
073     */
074    protected ConfigurationBase() { /* Just exists */ }
075
076        /*---------*\
077    ====** Methods **==========================================================
078        \*---------*/
079    /**
080     *  {@inheritDoc}
081     */
082    @Override
083    public final Map<String,Object> initData()
084    {
085        final Map<String,Object> buffer = new HashMap<>();
086
087        buffer.put( "databasePassword", "4%dFE8§4$gB" );
088        buffer.put( "databaseName", "bloodpressure" );
089        buffer.put( "dataFolder", Path.of( getProperty( PROPERTY_USER_HOME ), ".bloodpressure" ) );
090        buffer.put( "endDate", LocalDate.MAX );
091        buffer.put( "importFormat", CSV );
092        buffer.put( "importSource", "blutdruckdaten.de" );
093        buffer.put( "reportFormat", TEXT );
094        buffer.put( "reportStyle", "SIMPLE" );
095        buffer.put( "startDate", LocalDate.MIN );
096
097        final var retValue = Map.copyOf( buffer );
098
099        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
100        return retValue;
101    }   //  initData()
102
103    /**
104     *  {@inheritDoc}
105     */
106    @Override
107    public final void initializeDatabase( final Connection connection ) throws SQLException
108    {
109        final var ddl = format(
110            """
111            CREATE TABLE %1$s
112            (
113              %2$s TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE PRIMARY KEY,
114              systolic_pressure SMALLINT NOT NULL,
115              diastolic_pressure SMALLINT NOT NULL,
116              ignored BOOLEAN NOT NULL
117            )
118            """, TABLE_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA, COLUMN_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA_PRIMARY_KEY );
119
120        try( final var statement = connection.createStatement() )
121        {
122            statement.execute( ddl );
123        }
124    }   //  initializeDatabase()
125
126    /**
127     *  {@inheritDoc}
128     */
129    @Override
130    public final Connection retrieveConnection() throws SQLException
131    {
132        final var jdbcURL = format( "jdbc:h2:%1s/%2$s", PathStringConverter.INSTANCE.toString( getDataFolder() ), getDatabaseName() );
133        final var retValue = getConnection( jdbcURL, getUsername(), getDatabasePassword() );
134
135        //---* We want to have autocommit *------------------------------------
136        retValue.setAutoCommit( true );
137
138        //---* No warnings … *-------------------------------------------------
139        retValue.clearWarnings();
140
141        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
142        return retValue;
143    }   //  retrieveConnection()
144}
145//  class ConfigurationBase
146
147/*
148 *  End of File
149 */
